artist: Artist: George Cruikshank; Publisher: Frederick Arnold, London
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Patrick Butler
portfolio: From Plate IV from The Bottle, Frederick Arnold, London
provenance: Mr. and Mrs. Patrick Butler, St. Paul; given to MIA, 1977.
title: Unable to obtain employment, they are driven by poverty into the streets to beg and by this means they still supply the bottle.
